title: If we didn't buy the Championship Ashe but craft the skin chromas, is it added to our inventory?
body:
Hi,
I'm new to this forum and I'm sorry if this is the wrong section to post it.
But can anyone tell me if we didn't buy the Championship Ashe skin and we craft the golden chromas skin with our worlds token from doing mission, is it added to our inventory?

replies.body: If you craft the Championship Ashe chroma, you won't automatically unlock the Championship Ashe base skin. In order to use the chroma, you'd have to purchase the base skin. Hopefully that answers your question!
